body.name: TONOR Dynamic Karaoke Microphone for Singing with 5M XLR Cable, Metal Handheld Mic Compatible with Karaoke Machine/Speaker/Amp/Mixer for Karaoke Singing, Speech, Wedding and Outdoor Activity
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 20 mins
features: ♫15ft XLR to 1/4” Cable - Allowing the karaoke microphone to be directly used for the speaker, amplifier or mixer. Superior construction of the mic cable can isolate external electromagnetic interference and make the sound transmission more clearly.
♫Premium Construction - All metal construction ensures long life. This dynamic microphone is constructed out of premium hard metal for durability and strong resistance to impact.

♫Easy to Use - No battery required for operation. An external on/off switch on it for easy control of audio (Push up is ON, push down is OFF). When the microphone is not used, you can turn it OFF using the switch without unplugging the cable.

♫Cardioid Dynamic Microphone: TONOR’s wired dynamic microphone features a cardioid pickup pattern for greater gain while simultaneously minimizing background feedback. Perfect for karaoke machine, stage performance, wedding, church, interview, etc.

♫What You Get - This wired dynamic microphone comes in a full kit with all the right essentials - 1 Microphone, 1 XLR Cable, 1 Foam Mic Cover and 1 Instruction Manual to get you started. We offers a 12-month repair/replacement warranty and a 30-day hassle-free return policy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love it.
reviews.reviewText: Packaging was very nice and kept the microphone safe from damage. We use it for karaoke and it works like a charm. We have a blast using it when we have parties at home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great mic! I bought it for a karaoke birthday party and it worked perfectly. The sound quality is amazing! I use this for parties and personal use and it's fantastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good sounding mic for ION and for the money, switch works but rattles
reviews.reviewText: The mic works fine for the money and the purpose. This one is as replacement mic for the old ION system. Vice quality is good enough warm sounding. Mic body is metal and sturdy and looks good too. Only negative so far is the on/off switch which is working without any issue but rattles giving cheap feel. I bought over competing product Pyle mic just for lower relative impedance but costs more than Pyle, I have no experience with Pyle mic though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sound, cords may be a weak point but value is good!
reviews.reviewText: The mics work great. We have 2 we use for at home karaoke. Been using for several months a few times a week. Great sound quality!Only on issue is one of the cords is breaking away from the metal plug that goes into the microphone which is causing it to cut in and out. Wish we could get a cord replacement. We patched it with electrical tape to make due. We are very careful with them so seeing this was unfortunate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Mediocre performance with wired grip experience
reviews.reviewText: Got it for my karaoke device . Need a microphone with long cord . Call out best buy a few times . No one have such long cord like this . And party day is Thursday so didn’t got much time . Know Amazon never fail me about the deliveryPlug in gear up . Does feel a little bit disappointed. Compare to the old one we using this feel away too light talking about the weight in the hand.It make me feel cheap and the sounds became sharp when I switch to surround channel . But got no problem about the price at allAfter all it is pretty decent device when not require professional purposes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE This Mic Set!
reviews.reviewText: I love this mic set! Got it as backup for my expensive mic to use with my boombox PA. Mic is loud in a good way and does pick up ambient noise, it is multidirectional. Easy on/off switch on handle. Good quality cord with standard connector ends and good length. Even comes with windscreen. Attractive black with silver findings design. Great price, came next day with Prime, packed well in box. I'm considering buying another set for extra backup, I am that impressed with the quality. LOVE!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: My one year old son has killed like 3 of my mics, so i have purchased 4. This is by far the best mic. Put the black fome around the metal. I think he helps if in many ways. Amazing mic, haven't sang this good for a long time, owe it to the mic, gives you the power to hit the notes. Good price.

reviews.reviewTitle: No lo he usado mucho solo una ves pero me gustó tiene buen sonido y se escucha bien la voz
Great looking microphone but did not work with the system I had
reviews.reviewText: I was disappointed having to return the microphone, but it would not work with the system I am using and only produced a humming noise. I liked the quality feel and look so it is probably an excellent purchase for someone else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Tonor Dynamic Karaoke Microphone, and it has quickly become an essential addition to our karaoke setup. This metal handheld mic, complete with a 16.4ft XLR cable, is a powerhouse for anyone passionate about singing, public speaking, or hosting events.First and foremost, the build quality of this microphone is exceptional. The metal construction not only feels sturdy but also adds a touch of durability that's essential for lively karaoke sessions and various outdoor activities. The sleek design and ergonomic grip make it comfortable to hold for extended periods.The 16.4ft XLR cable provides generous flexibility, allowing for easy movement and manoeuvring during performances. The cable's length is perfect for connecting to karaoke machines, speakers, amps, mixers, or any other audio equipment you might use for your singing endeavours.The dynamic range of the microphone is impressive. It captures vocals with clarity and precision, ensuring that every nuance of your performance is faithfully reproduced. The microphone's versatility makes it suitable for a wide range of applications, from karaoke singing to speeches, weddings, and outdoor activities.One standout feature is the microphone's compatibility with various audio setups. Whether you're connecting it to a karaoke machine, speaker, amp, or mixer, the mic seamlessly integrates, delivering professional-grade audio quality. It's a reliable choice for both beginners and seasoned performers.Setting up the Karaoke Microphone is straightforward, and it's ready to use right out of the box. The plug-and-play design eliminates any hassle, allowing you to focus on your performance rather than technical details.In conclusion, the Microphone is a fantastic investment for anyone looking to elevate their singing or public speaking endeavours. Its build quality, dynamic range, and compatibility make it a standout choice in the world of karaoke microphones. If you're ready to unleash your inner star, this microphone is your perfect companion.
Quality is very good worth buying it
Un microfono facile da usare, di buona qualità, con il cavo molto lungo. La definizione di plug&play, non ho avuto nessun problema, davvero ottimo.
